hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: test_spec
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
# Check tcp ports in jerkins container ["28080", # "28000", # "9000" ].each do |port| describe port(port) do it { should be_listening } end end
# # Check anonymous http links # %w( # http://www.bing.com # ).each do |url| # describe command('curl -I -k ' + url + ' 2>/dev/null | grep HTTP') do # its(:stdout) { should match /HTTP\/1.1 200 OK/ } # end # end
# Check at least 2 GB free memory describe command("[ `free -ml | grep 'buffers/cache' | awk -F' ' '{print $4}'` -gt 2048 ]") do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end
# check cpu loadavg in latest one min ["172.17.0.1:22:10"].each do |item| (ip, port, cpu_load) = item.split(':') command_str = "[ `ssh -o stricthostkeychecking=no -p %s root@%s cat /proc/loadavg | awk '{print int($1+0.99)}'` -lt %s ]" \ % [port, ip, cpu_load] describe command(command_str) do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end end
# check docker container number ["172.17.0.1:22:11"].each do |item| (ip, port, container_count) = item.split(':') command_str = "[ `ssh -o stricthostkeychecking=no -p %s root@%s docker ps | sed 1d | wc -l` -lt %s ]" \ % [port, ip, container_count] describe command(command_str) do its(:exit_status) { should eq 0 } end end

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v1" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_jenkins/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="monitor/serverspec_check.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins/$download_file"
